snippet: Alex Rodriguez's absence from the team will avoid, for now, a media sideshow after a published report linked him anew to performance-enhancing drugs.
abstract: Alex Rodriguez's absence from the team will avoid, for now, a media sideshow after a published report linked him anew to performance-enhancing drugs.

headline.main: Rodriguez to Stay Away as Yankees Report
headline.print_headline: Rivera Misses Day 1 of Camp, but Rodriguez May Not Appear at All
